content.raw:
I was able to teleop my way through much of `qual_task_1.world` (when using the easier version from pull request #206).  Nice!

I noticed the following things:

* When a current step sequence is in progress, a new one is not accepted or is ignored, at least most of the time.  Might be important to fix, depending on where in the system the new goal is being dropped.
* Turning in place and walking backwards are very unreliable, usually ending with the robot falling over; I had to reset several times to get through `qual-task_1.world`.  Important to fix.
* The script doesn't die from Ctrl-C, presumably due to the raw terminal settings.  Not so important, but a nice to have.

But I suggest that we proceed with a release of the current version and file tickets on these issues, in addition to John's issue about the lack of a result message from the action server.
